title: Aliquot
description: Pertaining to a portion (volume or weight) of the whole

cimac_aliquot_id.description: Aliquot identifier assigned by the CIMAC-CIDC Network. Example: CIMAC-12453.

pbmc_aliquoted.description: Site or biobank provides the final number of PBMCs per vial that were frozen.

pbmc_recovered.description: Receiving site determines number fo PBMCs per vial recovered upon receipt.

material_used.description: Receiving site indicates how much material was used for assay purposes.

material_remaining.description: Receiving site indicates how much material remains after assay use.

aliquot_quality_status.description: Final status of aliquot after QC and pathology review.

aliquot_replacement.description: Status of aliquot if replacement is/was requested.

aliquot_status.description: Status of aliquot used for other assay, exhausted, destroyed, or returned.

material_extracted.description: The type of biological material that was extracted from this aliquot.

extracted_concentration.description: The concentration of biological material that was extracted from this aliquot.

units.description: The unit of biological material from this aliquot.

aliquot_amount.$comment: RECHECK Should this be moved to the sample level or renamed?
aliquot_amount.description: The amount of extracted aliquot shipped. Example: 400 ng

lymphocyte_influx.description: Extent of lymphocytic infiltration into the tumor stroma or surrounding environment. Example: 2

viable_stroma_percent_area.description: Percent area of viable tissue. Example: 10

viable_tumor_percent_area.description: Percent area that contains viable tumor cells. Example: 60

necrosis_percent_area.description: Percent area of necrotic tissue. Example: 5

fibrosis_percent_area.description: Percent area of fibrotic area. Example: 15
